title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Ofthe daughters. Mr. Malone, after Oldys, says, that Agnesmarried Sylvester Emelyuuf S'anford, Gent.; that Rose married Laughton of Calworth, D.D., in the county of Huntington ; that Lucy became the wife of Stephen Umwell ofLondon, merchant; and Martha of Bletso of Northampton. Another of the daughters was married to one Shermardine, a bookseller in Little Britain ; and Frances, the youngest,to Joseph Sandwell, a tobacconist in Newgate Street.
